item.title: Admins Cant Spawn Please help
item.dc:creator: @KINGSCAPE_x KINGSCAPE x
item.description:
@KINGSCAPE_x wrote:

I can easily help.
First search for,
public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
(in commands.java)
Then u delete where item is and copy it and paste under
public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand).
It only lets owners spawn because its under
public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)

then compile and your done.
your welcome

if you don’t understand add me on msn…
( justinm1997@hotmail.com )

Read full topic

item.title: Admins Cant Spawn Please help
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

is it

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && playerRight >= 2){
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
